GSD.description:
mm/kmemleak: reset tag when compare object pointer

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.110 by commit d5d5804acc16fce9726fbbd006660d8642e2c459. For more details please see the references link.
